title: Emery Jack the Copycat: A Story About Autistic Echoing
description: The park is Jace's favorite place to go. One day he meets a boy at the park that is different from all the other children he is used to playing with. Do you know someone who is unique? Meet Emery Jack the copycat! A story about autistic echoing that promotes friendship, self-awareness and inclusion.
author: Dezi Shepperd
